BusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: FRATERNAL ORDER OF POLICE GRAND LODGE

IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO ENCOURAGE AND PROMOTE THE HIGHEST STANDARDS OF PROFESSIONALISM, OFFER ENRICHING EDUCATIONAL PROGRAMS AND RECOGNIZE ADVANCES, SKILLS AND ABILITIES BEYOND ENTRY LEVEL QUALIFICATIONS OF FULL TIME LAW ENFORCEMENT OFFICERS OF THE U.S.
IRS990.Desc: FOP MEMBER SERVICES - THE LODGE PROVIDES VARIOUS SERVICES TO ITS MEMBERSHIP PRIMARILY IN THE FORM OF EDUCATING THE MEMBERSHIP. TOPICS COVERED INCLUDE LABOR ISSUES, BENEFITS (INSURANCE, ETC.), GRIEVANCES, SAFETY ISSUES AND POLICE PENSIONS. IN ADDITION, THE LODGE SENDS OUT A QUARTERLY NEWS JOURNAL TO ITS ENTIRE MEMBERSHIP.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: LABOR SERVICES - LABOR SERVICES PROVIDES A COMPREHENSIVE SET OF RESOURCES AND SERVICES DESIGNED TO ENSURE THAT NO OFFICER GOES TO THE BARGAINING TABLE ALONE. IN ADDITION, PROVIDES ASSISTANCE TO LODGES WHICH REQUIRE CONTRACT INFORMATION, EXPERIENCED LEGAL EXPERTS, TRAINING SEMINARS OR PERSONALIZED LABOR RESEARCH.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: LEGISLATIVE SERVICES - THE LODGE MAINTAINS AN OFFICE IN WASHINGTON DC FOR THE PURPOSE OF LOBBYING FOR PASSAGE OR SUPPORT ON VARIOUS CRIME BILLS AND OTHER LAW ENFORCEMENT ISSUES

ProgSrvcAccomActyOtherGrp.Desc: NATIONAL MEETINGS - THE LODGE HOLDS A BIENNIAL CONFERENCE WHERE EACH STATE LODGE SENDS DELEGATES TO VOTE ON VARIOUS ISSUES SURROUNDING LEGISLATION RELATED TO LAW ENFORCEMENT AND ELECTION OF OFFICERS. THE BOARD MEETS TWICE A YEAR.
LABEL PROGRAM EXPENDITURES - THE LODGE SOLICITS INDIVIDUAL DONATIONS THROUGH THE LABEL PROGRAM, WHICH INCLUDES A DONATION REQUEST LETTER AND TOKEN RETURN ADDRESS LABELS FOR THE DONOR.
PAC FUND EXPENDITURES - THE LODGE MAINTAINS A SEGREGATED POLITICAL ACTION COMMITTEE FUND TO MAKE POLITICAL DONATIONS.
INFORMATIONAL SERVICES - THE LODGE ACCUMULATES AND MAINTAINS VARIOUS PERSONNEL AND PAYROLL DATA ITEMS THROUGHOUT THE U.S. ALSO SPONSORS LABOR SEMINARS AND OTHER EDUCATIONAL SEMINARS

OrganizationBusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: FRATERNAL ORDER OF POLICE POLITICAL ACTION COMMITTEE

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE NATIONAL FRATERNAL ORDER OF POLICE POLITICAL ACTION COMMITTEE IS A SEGREGATED FUND AS DEFINED UNDER SECTION 527(F)(3) AND COLLECTS AND DISBURSES DONATIONS TO SUPPORT CANDIDATES FOR FEDERAL OFFICE WHO CAN AFFECT LEGISLATION OF INTEREST TO THE ORGANIZATION.
THE LODGE HAS EVALUATED ITS TAX POSITIONS AND HAS CONCLUDED THAT IT HAS TAKEN NO UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS THAT REQUIRE ADJUSTMENT OR DISCLOSURE IN THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS.
COST OF GOODS SOLD NETTED AGAINST GROSS RECEIPTS FOR TAX PURPOSES 2,074. RENTAL EXPENSES NETTED AGAINST RENTAL INCOME 50,063.
COST OF GOODS SOLD NETTED AGAINST GROSS RECEIPTS FOR TAX PURPOSES 2,074. RENTAL EXPENSES NETTED AGAINST RENTAL INCOME 50,063.

RecipientBusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: NATIONAL FRATERNAL ORDER OF POLICE FOUNDATION

RecipientTable.PurposeOfGrantTxt: TO ASSIST IN FUNDING THE CHARITABLE PROGRAMS OF THE FOUNDATION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: GRANT FUNDS AWARDED TO THE NATIONAL ORDER OF POLICE FOUNDATION ARE DONE SO IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE CRITERIA SET FORTH BY THE BYLAWS OF THE LODGE. THE LODGE HAS ACCESS TO THE BOOKS AND RECORDS OF THE FOUNDATION AND MONITORS GRANT FUND USE ON AN ONGOING BASIS.

TO SUPPORT AND DEFEND THE CONSTITUTION OF THE UNITED STATES; TO INCULCATE LOYALTY AND ALLEGIANCE TO THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA; TO PROMOTE AND FOSTER THE ENFORCEMENT OF LAW AND ORDER; TO IMPROVE THE INDIVIDUAL AND COLLECTIVE PROFICIENCY OF OUR MEMBERS IN THE PERFORMANCE OF THEIR DUTIES; TO ENCOURAGE FRATERNAL, EDUCATIONAL, CHARITABLE AND SOCIAL ACTIVITIES AMONG LAW ENFORCEMENT OFFICERS; TO ADVOCATE AND STRIVE FOR UNIFORM APPLICATION OF THE CIVIL SERVICE MERIT SYSTEM FOR APPOINTMENT AND PROMOTION; TO SUPPORT THE IMPROVEMENT OF THE STANDARD OF LIVING AND WORKING CONDITIONS OF THE LAW ENFORCEMENT PROFESSION THROUGH EVERY LEGAL AND ETHICAL MEANS AVAILABLE; TO CREATE AND MAINTAIN TRADITION OF ESPRIT DE CORPS ENSURING FIDELITY TO DUTY UNDER ALL CONDITIONS AND CIRCUMSTANCES; TO CULTIVATE A SPIRIT OF FRATERNALISM AND MUTUAL HELPFULNESS AMONG OUR MEMBERS AND THE PEOPLE WE SERVE; TO INCREASE THE EFFICIENCY OF THE LAW ENFORCEMENT PROFESSION AND THUS MORE FIRMLY TO ESTABLISH THE CONFIDENCE OF THE PUBLIC IN THE SERVICE DEDICATED TO THE PROTECTION OF LIFE AND PROPERTY.
TOTAL NUMBER OF FORMS W-2 LISTED ON 2017 W-3 (102) LESS NUMBER OF TRUSTEES PAID BY THE LODGE (55)= 47 EMPLOYEES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: EACH NATIONAL OFFICER IS ELECTED BY A VOTE OF THE QUALIFIED DELEGATES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE PRESIDENT AND TREASURER REVIEW THE FORM 990 IN DETAIL WITH THE PREPARERS AND THEN PROVIDE THE ENTIRE BOARD WITH A FINAL DRAFT OF THE 990 BEFORE IT IS FILED.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ANNUALLY, THERE IS A REQUIREMENT THAT ALL TRUSTEES COMPLETE AND SIGN A FIDUCIARY AND DISCLOSURE STATEMENT. THESE STATEMENTS ARE REVIEWED BY THE EXECUTIVE BOARD AND WOULD BE REFERRED TO IN THE CASE OF A POTENTIAL CONFLICT.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY, WHISTLEBLOWER POLICY AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST.
